languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает несколько слов на странном языке — вроде и мелодичном, но в исполнении дознавателя звучащем угловато и странно. Встретив пристальный взгляд незнакомки, Хейнрикс поворачивается к вам.{/n} "У меня печальная новость, {name}. Создание перед нами — не мутант, как предполагают местные, а представительница рода {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдаров{/g} — одна из сонма врагов Человечества. Тебе не следует верить ей. И даже говорить с ней дольше самого необходимого".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает несколько слов на странном языке — вроде и мелодичном, но в исполнении дознавателя звучащем угловато и странно. Встретив пристальный взгляд незнакомки, Хейнрикс поворачивается к вам.{/n} "У меня печальная новость, {name}. Создание перед нами — не мутант, как предполагают местные, а представительница рода эльдар — одна из сонма врагов Человечества, что встречаются в Просторе Коронус. Я бы не рекомендовал не то чтобы верить — даже говорить с ней дольше самого необходимого".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix tosses out some words in a strange language — there is a hint of musicality to it, but the Interrogator's rendering is harsh and off-putting. After meeting the gaze of the unknown being, Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "Regrettable news, {name}. This creature is not a mutant as the locals assumed, but a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} — one of the myriad enemies of Humanity. You should not trust this creature. Do not communicate with it any longer than necessary."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает несколько слов на странном языке — вроде и мелодичном, но в исполнении дознавателя звучащем угловато и странно. Встретив пристальный взгляд незнакомки, Хейнрикс поворачивается к вам.{/n} "У меня печальная новость, {name}. Создание перед нами — не мутант, как предполагают местные, а представительница рода {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдаров{/g} — одна из сонма врагов Человечества. Тебе не следует верить ей. И даже говорить с ней дольше самого необходимого".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix tosses out some words in a strange language — there is a hint of musicality to it, but the interrogator's rendering is harsh and off-putting. After meeting the gaze of the unknown being, Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "I have regrettable news, {name}. The creature before us is not a mutant as the locals assumed, but a representative of the Aeldari — one of the myriad enemies of Humanity found in the Koronus Expanse. Not only should you not trust this creature, you should not even speak to it any longer than necessary."

After meeting the gaze of the unknown being, Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "I have regrettable news, {name}. The creature before us is not a mutant as the locals assumed, but a representative of the Aeldari — one of the myriad enemies of Humanity found in the Koronus Expanse. Not only should you not trust this creature, you should not even speak to it any longer than necessary."

After meeting the gaze of the unknown being, Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "I have regrettable news, {name}. The creature before us is not a mutant as the locals assumed, but a representative of the Aeldari — one of the myriad enemies of Humanity found in the Koronus Expanse. Not only should you not trust this creature, you should not even speak to it any longer than necessary."

{n}Heinrix tosses out some words in a strange language — there is a hint of musicality to it, but the Interrogator's rendering is harsh and off-putting. After meeting the gaze of the unknown being, Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "Regrettable news, {name}. This creature is not a mutant as the locals assumed, but a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} — one of the myriad enemies of Humanity. You should not trust this creature. Do not communicate with it any longer than necessary."

languages.text: {n}海因里希以某种古怪的语言说了些什么。他的语调中也带着一丝悠扬的意味，但声音听起来却很刺耳，令人不快。海因里希与这只未知生物对视一眼以后，将头转向了你。{/n}“我有个遗憾的消息，{name}。我们面前的这只生物，并不是当地人宣称的变种人，而是典型的{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}，他们是人类的众多敌人之一。绝不能相信这只生物，也不应当在没必要的情况下与它对话。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix tosses out some words in a strange language — there is a hint of musicality to it, but the Interrogator's rendering is harsh and off-putting. After meeting the gaze of the unknown being, Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "Regrettable news, {name}. This creature is not a mutant as the locals assumed, but a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} — one of the myriad enemies of Humanity. You should not trust this creature. Do not communicate with it any longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希以某种古怪的语言说了些什么。他的语调中也带着一丝悠扬的意味，但声音听起来却很刺耳，令人不快。海因里希与这只未知生物对视一眼以后，将头转向了你。{/n}“我有个遗憾的消息要告诉你，{name}。我们面前的这只生物，并不是当地人宣称的变种人，而是典型的{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}。他们是人类在科罗努斯扩区的诸多敌人之一。你不仅不应该相信这只生物，甚至根本不该在没必要的情况下与它对话。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix pronuncia unas palabras en un idioma desconocido. Hay cierta musicalidad en ellas, pero la voz del interrogador es severa y desagradable. Tras mirar fijamente al ser desconocido, Heinrix se gira hacia ti.{/n} «Malas noticias, {name}. La criatura que se encuentra frente a nosotros no es una mutante, como asumían los locales, sino una representante de los {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}: unos de los incontables enemigos de la Humanidad. Desde luego, no debería confiar en ella. Comuníquese con ella lo estrictamente necesario».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix tosses out some words in a strange language — there is a hint of musicality to it, but the Interrogator's rendering is harsh and off-putting. After meeting the gaze of the unknown being, Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "Regrettable news, {name}. This creature is not a mutant as the locals assumed, but a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} — one of the myriad enemies of Humanity. You should not trust this creature. Do not communicate with it any longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix pronuncia unas palabras en un idioma desconocido. Hay cierta musicalidad en ellas, pero la voz del interrogador es severa y desagradable. Tras mirar fijamente al ser desconocido, Heinrix se gira hacia ti.{/n} «Tengo malas noticias, {name}. La criatura que se encuentra frente a nosotros no es una mutante, como asumían los locales, sino una representante de los {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}: unos de los incontables enemigos de la Humanidad en la Extensión de Koronus. Desde luego, no debería confiar en ella, pero ni tan siquiera debería hablar con ella más de lo estrictamente necesario».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは聞き慣れない言語で何かを投げかける…音楽的な片鱗は感じられるが、インテロゲイターの発するそれは厳しく、不快感を覚えさせるものだった。未知の存在と視線を交わしてから、ハインリックスはあなたの方を向く。{/n}「残念な知らせだ、{name}さん。目の前の生物は地元民が考えていたような変異体ではなく、無数に存在する人類の敵のひとつ…{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}の代表者だ。信用するどころか、必要以上に話すのもやめておく方がいい」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix tosses out some words in a strange language — there is a hint of musicality to it, but the Interrogator's rendering is harsh and off-putting. After meeting the gaze of the unknown being, Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "Regrettable news, {name}. This creature is not a mutant as the locals assumed, but a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} — one of the myriad enemies of Humanity. You should not trust this creature. Do not communicate with it any longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは聞き慣れない言語で何かを投げかける…音楽的な片鱗は感じられるが、インテロゲイターの発するそれは厳しく、不快感を覚えさせるものだった。未知の存在と視線を交わしてから、ハインリックスはあなたの方を向く。{/n}「残念な知らせだ、{name}さん。目の前の生物は地元民が考えていたような変異体ではなく、無数に存在する人類の敵のひとつ…{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}の代表者だ。信用するどころか、必要以上に話すのもやめておく方がいい」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix stößt einige Worte in einer fremden Sprache aus – nicht unmusikalisch, aber bei dem Interrogator klingt es barsch und abweisend. Nach einem Blickkontakt mit dem unbekannten Wesen wendet Heinrix sich dir zu.{/n} "Bedauerliche Neuigkeiten, {name}. Diese Kreatur ist kein Mutant, wie die Einheimischen vermuten, sondern gehört zu den {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} – einem der zahllosen Feinde der Menschheit. Ihr solltet dieser Kreatur nicht trauen. Kommuniziert nicht länger als nötig mit ihr."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix tosses out some words in a strange language — there is a hint of musicality to it, but the Interrogator's rendering is harsh and off-putting. After meeting the gaze of the unknown being, Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "Regrettable news, {name}. This creature is not a mutant as the locals assumed, but a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} — one of the myriad enemies of Humanity. You should not trust this creature. Do not communicate with it any longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix äußert einige Worte in einer fremden Sprache – nicht unmusikalisch, aber bei dem Interrogator klingt es barsch und abweisend. Nach einem Blickkontakt mit dem unbekannten Wesen wendet Heinrix sich dir zu.{/n} "Ich habe bedauerliche Nachrichten, {name}. Die Kreatur vor uns ist kein Mutant, wie die Einheimischen vermuten, sondern gehört zu den {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} – einem der zahllosen Feinde der Menschheit in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Ihr solltet dieser Kreatur nicht nur nicht vertrauen, sondern auch nicht länger mit ihr sprechen als unbedingt erforderlich."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lance quelques mots que vous ne comprenez pas. L'étrange langage qu'il parle a une certaine musicalité, mais son accent le rend austère et rebutant. Après avoir croisé le regard de l'être inconnu, l'interrogateur se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Mauvaise nouvelle, {name}. Contrairement à ce que croient les habitants de ce monde, cette créature n'est pas une mutante, mais une {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, une représentante de l'une des innombrables espèce de xénos qui menacent l'humanité. Vous ne devriez pas lui faire confiance. Je vous conseille vivement de limiter vos conversations au strict nécessaire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix tosses out some words in a strange language — there is a hint of musicality to it, but the Interrogator's rendering is harsh and off-putting. After meeting the gaze of the unknown being, Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "Regrettable news, {name}. This creature is not a mutant as the locals assumed, but a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} — one of the myriad enemies of Humanity. You should not trust this creature. Do not communicate with it any longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lance quelques mots que vous ne comprenez pas. L'étrange langage qu'il parle a une certaine musicalité, mais son accent le rend austère et rebutant. Après avoir croisé le regard de l'être inconnu, l'interrogateur se tourne vers vous.{/n} « J'ai une mauvaise nouvelle, {name}. Contrairement à ce que croient les habitants de ce monde, cette créature n'est pas une mutante, mais une {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}. Elle est la représentante de l'une des innombrables espèces de xénos qui menacent l'humanité dans les Étendues de Koronus. Je vous conseille vivement de vous méfier d'elle et de limiter vos conversations au strict nécessaire. »

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix tosses out some words in a strange language — there is a hint of musicality to it, but the Interrogator's rendering is harsh and off-putting. After meeting the gaze of the unknown being, Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "Regrettable news, . This creature is not a mutant as the locals assumed, but a representative of the Aeldari — one of the myriad enemies of Humanity. You should not trust this creature. Do not communicate with it any longer than necessary."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix tuhaf bir dilde bir şeyler söylüyor. Sesinde bir miktar müzikalite olsa da Sorgucu'nun tarzı sert ve rahatsız edici. Heinrix, bilinmeyen varlıkla bir süre bakıştıktan sonra sana dönüyor.{/n} "Kötü haberlerim var {name}. Bu yaratık, yerel halkın tahmininin aksine bir mutant değil, İnsanlığın sayısız düşmanlarından biri olan {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldarilerin{/g} bir temsilcisi. Bu yaratığa güvenmemeli, onunla gereğinden fazla iletişim kurmaktan kaçınmalısın."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix tosses out some words in a strange language — there is a hint of musicality to it, but the Interrogator's rendering is harsh and off-putting. After meeting the gaze of the unknown being, Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "Regrettable news, {name}. This creature is not a mutant as the locals assumed, but a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} — one of the myriad enemies of Humanity. You should not trust this creature. Do not communicate with it any longer than necessary."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix tuhaf bir dilde bir şeyler söylüyor. Sesinde bir miktar müzikalite olsa da Sorgucu'nun tarzı sert ve rahatsız edici. Heinrix, bilinmeyen varlıkla bir süre bakıştıktan sonra sana dönüyor.{/n} "Kötü haberlerim var {name}. Bu yaratık, yerel halkın tahmininin aksine bir mutant değil, İnsanlığın sayısız düşmanlarından biri olan {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'nin bir temsilcisi. Bu yaratığa güvenmemeli, onunla gereğinden fazla iletişim kurmaktan kaçınmalısın."
